rules.description: CapsLock -> esc (tap) + left_control (hold)
Hyper + SPC -> Raycast
Hyper Key: Right Option → left shift + left option + left command (⌃⇧⌥⌘)
Mac OSX: left cmd + double-tap q → close application
Mac OSX: disable cmd + h to prevent minimising an application window
Mac OSX: disable cmd + option + h + m to prevent minimising all windows
Change hyper-(jikl) to (←↑↓→) keys
Disable the accidental keystroke prevention of Caps Lock
Change right_shift x2 to mission_control
Use (TODO: fn?) right_command+h/l to switch tabs in an application.
Use (TODO: fn?) right_command+j/k to switch windows of the foreground application .
Change cmd+backslach to cmd+f11 if pressed in VSCode or Cursor
o Launcher
Double tap left-shift to return ~/
CapsLock to Hyper/Escape
Hyper Misc    (Check https://github.com/suliveevil/Capslock for all details)
Use right_command+;/' to cycle through running applications (like command+tab).
Use right_command+h/l to switch tabs in an application.
Use right_command+j/k to switch windows of the foreground application .
Caps Lock to Esc (tap) + Ctrl (hold)
R_CMD -> switch input languages + RGH/home -> same
